definition: to make into/to change into/-ization/to ... -ize/to transform/abbr. for 化學|化学[hua4 xue2]

sentences.english: Among other things, plasticisers were substituted for palm oil as clouding agents in drinks.
sentences.chinese: 塑化劑代替了棕櫚油作爲飲料中的混濁劑。

sentences.english: This plasticizer scare has everyone panicking and it's being found in so many things.
sentences.chinese: 塑化劑風暴真讓人人心惶惶，好多東西里都有。

sentences.english: It started last month when plasticizer was found in Bai Jiu produced by Jiuguijiu.
sentences.chinese: 上個月開始，酒鬼酒生產的白酒被發現含有有塑化劑。

sentences.english: Children and especially pregnant women should avoid being exposed to plasticizers.
sentences.chinese: 兒童，特別是孕婦應當避免攝入塑化劑。

sentences.english: It is illegal to add any toxic plasticizer in food or drinks.
sentences.chinese: 在食品或飲料中添加任何有毒的塑化劑都是非法的。

sentences.english: Hammered by the plasticizer scandal, natural fruit juice becomes extremely popular, and the price of fruits continues to rise.
sentences.chinese: 受到塑化劑影響，天然果汁夯，水果價格也持續看漲。

sentences.english: And now for the mainland's follow up measures against the plasticizer, DEHP.
sentences.chinese: 現在，大陸繼續採取措施對抗塑化劑DEHP。

definition: to cross the limit/to be over the accepted norm/excessive
to detect/to examine and discover/to sense
dioxin, carcinogenic heterocyclic hydrocarbon (esp. Taiwan usage)
